openadk.library.impl
Class SIF2xFormatter

java.lang.Object
  openadk.library.SIFFormatter
      openadk.library.impl.SIF2xFormatter

public class SIF2xFormatter
extends SIFFormatter

Represents a SIFFormatter than can be used to format data to and from SIF 2.x datatypes

Version:
2.0
Author:
Andrew Elmhorst

supportsNamespaces

public boolean supportsNamespaces()
Returns true if the formatter supports writing the xsi:nil attribute. If the return value is false, SIFWriter will write an empty string

Specified by:
supportsNamespaces in class SIFFormatter
Returns:
